list_definition.definition: to give (a person) enough of what is wanted or needed to take away hunger, curiosity etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The apple didn’t satisfy my hunger
I told him enough to satisfy his curiosity.
She is very difficult to satisfy.
